content.rendered:
Elena Ivanuta joined Regent College London in 2019. Since that time, she has been part of the Admissions team, mainly dealing with the HND programme. Recently she has been appointed as Admissions, Recruitment and Widening Access Officer and she is really excited to expand her role giving excellent customer service to our growing number of applicants.  She graduated BSc in Accountancy and IT in Romania, and she is a member of the Association of Accounting Technicians since 2018.

Key responsibilities:

  • Advise prospective students about the programs offered, eligibility and admissions procedure
  • Provide support to prospective students & enrolled students
  • Process applications of prospective students
  • Maintain a positive and professional attitude towards customers at all times
